dr.evomodel.speciation
Class BirthDeathGernhard08Model

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.AbstractModel
      dr.evomodel.speciation.SpeciationModel
          dr.evomodel.speciation.UltrametricSpeciationModel
              dr.evomodel.speciation.BirthDeathGernhard08Model
All Implemented Interfaces:
Units, Model, ModelListener, StatisticList, VariableListener, MPISerializable, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
public class BirthDeathGernhard08Model
extends UltrametricSpeciationModel

Birth Death model based on Gernhard 2008 "The conditioned reconstructed process" Journal of Theoretical Biology Volume 253, Issue 4, 21 August 2008, Pages 769-778 doi:10.1016/j.jtbi.2008.04.005 (http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jtbi.2008.04.005)

This derivation conditions directly on fixed N taxa.

The inference is directly on b-d (strictly positive) and d/b (constrained in [0,1))

Vefified using simulated trees generated by Klass tree sample. (http://www.klaashartmann.com/treesample/)

Sampling proportion not verified via simulation. Proportion set by default to 1, an assignment which makes the expressions identical to the expressions before the change.

Author:
Joseph Heled Date: 24/02/2008
See Also:

logTreeProbability

public double logTreeProbability(int taxonCount)
Description copied from class: UltrametricSpeciationModel
"fixed" part of likelihood. Guaranteed to be called before any logNodeProbability calls for one evaluation of the tree.

Specified by:
logTreeProbability in class UltrametricSpeciationModel
Parameters:
